name: Zombie Miner (Z4NGA)
description:
You died! Now you're a zombie that has to mine minerals for life while chilling to lofi_hiphop beats. Can you mine all the gold and power ores to lift your curse?
Buy buffs and potions from the shop to help you along the way !!

System Requirements

MINIMUM:

  • OS: Windows 7+, Vista, XP
  • Processor: 1.7 Ghz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8.1+
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
